link.description:
This section aims to introduce Bitloops, our Vision, and explain why we built Bitloops Language. 
    
    In addition, we want to explain how & why Bitloops Language is different to other programming languages, and how 
    Bitloops can help developers write clean, well-designed code, build high-quality, maintainable software and learn 
    (whilst building) many of the core software development principles that senior engineers understand after decades of experience.
